message: Hey, I'm having some issues setting up my flask app on ep.io. Everything was working smoothly until I started using flask.session. Now, I'm getting 500 errors.
I'm not seeing anything unusual in the console. My url is slingshot.ep.io
Flask doesn't log errors to the console by default; you need to configure the logging to do so manually. I think there's a snippet someone else used, but I can't find it right now
the TESTING and  PROPAGATE_EXCEPTIONS (0.7) configs will cause errors to be logged: https://github.com/mitsuhiko/flask/commit/8569dfee6136bfda4a5fa2297aed3d82700bb1a5
